item.title: How To Watch the 2025 MLS Playoffs
item.dc:creator: Taylor Kujawa
item.description: It’s survival of the fittest as Major League Soccer (MLS) clubs fight for a place in the MLS Cup Final. The MLS Playoffs will air on MLS Season Pass and FOX Sports networks starting in October, with full coverage details, kickoff schedule, streaming links and highlights.
item.content:encoded: It’s survival of the fittest as Major League Soccer (MLS) clubs fight for a place in the MLS Cup Final. The MLS Playoffs will air on MLS Season Pass and FOX Sports networks starting in October, with full coverage details, kickoff schedule, streaming links and highlights.

item.title: NFL Plus Review 2025: Score Live NFL Action on the Go
